channel.title: Macos on Thomas Chester's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Macos on Thomas Chester's Blog

item.title: Using the bpod Gem
item.description: This post will discuss installing the bpod gem on a macOS desktop and then scheduling it to change your desktop picture each day to the Bing home page image.

item.title: MySQL Backups with AutoMySQLBackup
item.description: This walk-through will describe how to configure AutoMySQLBackup to perform scheduled backups of a MySQL database and then use rsync to make a redundant copy to another computer.

item.title: Installing ownCloud on ArchLinux
item.description: Do you like the idea of DropBox but want to host the files on a server that you control. This how-to will walkthrough installing ownCloud on an ArchLinux installation and then configuring a Mac client to sync with it.

item.title: Create a Debian Bootable Install Disk
item.description: In this post I discuss how to create a bootable USB disk on Mac OS X for the Debian “Testing” network installer.
